original_text: And Aaron and his sons shall eat the flesh of the ram, and the bread that is in the basket by the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.
korean_text: 아론과 그의 아들들은 회막 문에서 그 숫양의 고기와 광주리에 있는 떡을 먹을지라

sentences.original_text: And Aaron and his sons shall eat the flesh of the ram
sentences.korean_translation: 아론과 그의 아들들은 수양의 고기를 먹을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and the bread that is in the basket
by the door of the tabernacle of the congregation
